column2: an A.M. Eatery////My waiter was just SLOWWWWWW! I needed creamer for my coffee well I had to get up and get my own. Also
column3: it started raining and we got moved inside of the restaurant and left everything (napkins
column5: etc... inside) asked her for some new silverware well she never brought it! Once again I got up and got it myself (thanks one waiter that kept being so helpful).
